benchmark_details.name: MMT-Bench (Multimodal Benchmark for Evaluating Large Vision-Language Models)
benchmark_details.overview: A comprehensive benchmark designed to assess Large Vision-Language Models (LVLMs) across massive multimodal tasks requiring expert knowledge and deliberate visual recognition, localization, reasoning, and planning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate Large Vision-Language Models (LVLMs) in multimodal multitask understanding and track progress towards multitask AGI.

data.source: Comprehensive curation from various multimodal tasks including vehicle driving and embodied navigation.
data.annotation: Meticulously curated with specific guidelines for quality control.

methodology.calculation: Overall accuracies are calculated based on the modelâ€™s responses to the multi-choice questions presented in MMT-Bench.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy demonstrates better performance in understanding and executing multimodal tasks.
methodology.validation: Results validated by comparing with performance across other benchmarks.
